subject: Re: The copper vs steel box.
author: purplespacefriend
full_text:
Yeah, some is due the size, the copper box is smaller. I just made 
the steel box, so was testign it too.

 Frank-S

>
> The copper box definitely gives a different sound than the steel.

> LC

use

Or--

copper
